channel.title: boubkerbribri on PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content in boubkerbribri on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: Automated UI tests tutorial
item.description: One year ago, the QA team started to develop a new test framework, based on Puppeteer, Mocha, and Chai. You can read more about the framework in this previous article: The (new) PrestaShop Test Framework. Since then, the tests coverage has been continually increasing, and we recently improved our framework by switching to Playwright. In this article, we will explain how to create a new UI (User Interface) test for the PrestaShop core project.
